= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * shows a miniwindow when double is active

= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [miniwin] and its dependencies
  * [pluginhelper] and its dependencies
  * [ldplugin]
  * [broadcast_double]
 * see the [Download] Page, and copy the file into worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * the miniwindow will not show until the command "cp check" is run
 * if you do not see the window, "bdbl Double toggle"

= Screenshots =
 http://bastmush.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/double/dbl.png

= Help =
 * "bdbl double toggle" to toggle the window
 {{{
/*
miniwin_double v1 Double Commands
-----------------------------------------------

set            : set settings
toggle         : toggle window
*/
